answers.answer: I'm sorry but I don't see a question here .... if you would please be more specific if you do have questions or concerns we will be happy to answer to the best of our ability.  Kindest regards ....

I agree with japdip and I cannot think of any person who wouldn't agree.What were you thinking when you wrote your comment?How would you answer if I wrote a post like the following?'Type 1 Diabetes. Humalog and Lantus'.Katrin
I'm so sorry to hear about your cancer diagnosis. There are wonderful women here ready to help, but more information on what you're asking is needed. Please write again.Wishing you all the best,nc
